eksath jathika pakshaye mulasthanaya wana ‘sirikotha’ sewaya karana karya mandalayata watup gewimata nohakiwima nisa ema pakshaye mahalekamwaraya saha bhandagarikawaraya athara ugra matha gatumak hatagena athayi e.ja.pa. aaranchi marga pawasayi.naya mudalak labagena 35 denek wana sewakayange watup gewana lesa ranil wikramasinha mahatha e.ja.pa. mahalekamwarayata upades di athi muth bhandagarikawaraya saha lekamwaraya athara pawathina wirasakaya hethuwen watup gewima dinen dina athapasu wana bawa sirikotha sewakayo pawasathi.widesha ratawal kihipayakin pakshayata labunu aadhara mangin methek sirikotha sewakayanta watup gewa athi bawath me wana wita ema aadhara mudal nolabena thaththwayakata pathwa athi heyin watup gewima barapathala gataluwak wi athi bawath anawaranaya weyi.
ehi gihin balanna bala therum ganna tharam deyak thibenawa.
